Hello, I am Stanley Umezuruike aka CodeHunta. 

I am an Android Developer and a Pythonista! 

Hippie!!! 

msg = "hello world!" 
print(msg)

a = 4 
b = 3 
c = (a**2 + b**2) #exponential operator 
x = math.sqrt(c) #square root operator 
y = x % 2 #modulus operator 
print("The square root of ", c, " is ", x) 
print(y)
